nodes.text: And Then There Were Some: The Gamorrean Guard's Tale

And Then There Were Some: The Gamorrean Guard's Tale by William F. Wu tells the tale of Gartogg—a dim-witted even by Gamorrean standards Gamorrean guard—as he tries to solve a series of murders in Jabba's Palace. The short story appeared in Tales from Jabba's Palace which was published by Bantam Spectra in January 1996.
